subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: Babylonian Astrology: When Stars Were Gods
description: A quick win: understand Babylonian Astrology: When Stars Were Gods.

hook.text: Your zodiac sign comes from Babylon. Ancient priests watched the sky and invented astrology as a form of prayer.

buildup.text: Babylonian priests mapped constellations and linked them to gods. Planetary movements predicted war, floods, and kings.

discovery.text: The zodiac, the seven-day week, and the 360-degree circle all originate from Babylonian sky-watching religion.

twist.text: Astrology was serious science in Babylon. It became superstition after Greek rationalism separated faith from the stars.

climax.text: Every horoscope traces back to Babylonian priests 4,000 years ago. Ancient religion lives on in pop culture.

punchline.text: Your zodiac sign is 4,000 years old. Babylon's priests invented it.
